nodes.text: The Mon Mothma Memorial Medical Center was a hospital on Coruscant named after Mon Mothma, hero of the New Republic.

Jedi Knight Valin Horn was taken there in 43.5 ABY after he suffered a psychotic breakdown. Shortly after, however, he was transferred back to the Jedi Temple, and eventually encased in carbonite and placed in the Armand Isard Correctional Facility.
